name: Orc
description: Orcs trace their creation to Gruumsh, a powerful god who roamed the wide open spaces of the Material Plane. Even when they turn their devotion to other gods, orcs retain Gruumsh's gifts: endurance, determination, and the ability to see in darkness. Orcs are, on average, tall and broad with gray skin, sharply pointed ears, and prominent lower canines that resemble small tusks.

traits.Adrenaline Rush: You can take the Dash action as a Bonus Action. When you do so, you gain a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to your Proficiency Bonus. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Short or Long Rest.
traits.Darkvision: You have Darkvision with a range of 120 feet.
traits.Relentless Endurance: When you are reduced to 0 Hit Points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 Hit Point instead. Once you use this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a Long Rest.
